quote: Life isn’t about getting and having, it’s about giving and being.
author: Kevin Kruse

quote: Whatever the mind of man can conceive and believe, it can achieve.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: Strive not to be a success, but rather to be of value.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Two roads diverged in a wood, and I—I took the one less traveled by, And that has made all the difference.
author: Robert Frost

quote: I attribute my success to this: I never gave or took any excuse.
author: Florence Nightingale

quote: You miss 100% of the shots you don’t take.
author: Wayne Gretzky

quote: I’ve missed more than 9000 shots in my career... I’ve failed over and over and over again in my life. And that is why I succeed.
author: Michael Jordan

quote: The most difficult thing is the decision to act, the rest is merely tenacity.
author: Amelia Earhart

quote: Every strike brings me closer to the next home run.
author: Babe Ruth

quote: Definiteness of purpose is the starting point of all achievement.
author: W. Clement Stone

quote: Life is what happens to you while you’re busy making other plans.
author: John Lennon

quote: We become what we think about.
author: Earl Nightingale

quote: Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things that you didn’t do than by the ones you did do...
author: Mark Twain

quote: Life is 10% what happens to me and 90% of how I react to it.
author: Charles Swindoll

quote: The most common way people give up their power is by thinking they don’t have any.
author: Alice Walker

quote: The mind is everything. What you think you become.
author: Buddha

quote: The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now.
author: Chinese Proverb

quote: An unexamined life is not worth living.
author: Socrates

quote: Eighty percent of success is showing up.
author: Woody Allen

quote: Your time is limited, so don’t waste it living someone else’s life.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Winning isn’t everything, but wanting to win is.
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: I am not a product of my circumstances. I am a product of my decisions.
author: Stephen Covey

quote: Every child is an artist. The problem is how to remain an artist once he grows up.
author: Pablo Picasso

quote: You can never cross the ocean until you have the courage to lose sight of the shore.
author: Christopher Columbus

quote: I’ve learned that people will forget what you said... but people will never forget how you made them feel.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: Either you run the day, or the day runs you.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: Whether you think you can or you think you can’t, you’re right.
author: Henry Ford

quote: Whatever you can do, or dream you can, begin it. Boldness has genius, power and magic in it.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: People often say that motivation doesn’t last. Well, neither does bathing. That’s why we recommend it daily.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: In your presence, even my doubts become peaceful.
author: Franz Kafka

quote: With you, even silence feels like a conversation.
author: Franz Kafka

quote: Your smile is enough to quiet my restless thoughts.
author: Franz Kafka

quote: I find myself whenever I am close to you.
author: Franz Kafka

quote: Loving you makes the world appear kinder.
author: Franz Kafka

quote: In your laughter, I discover my courage.
author: Franz Kafka

quote: Your presence is my quiet celebration.
author: Franz Kafka

quote: When I think of you, my heart feels lighter.
author: Franz Kafka

quote: You turn ordinary moments into memories.
author: Franz Kafka

quote: With you, I no longer fear tomorrow.
author: Franz Kafka

quote: Your love teaches me how to trust life.
author: Franz Kafka

quote: I feel complete when I walk beside you.
author: Franz Kafka

quote: Your voice settles the storms inside me.
author: Franz Kafka

quote: Being loved by you feels like being understood.
author: Franz Kafka

quote: Our love makes even uncertainty beautiful.
author: Franz Kafka

quote: In your eyes, I recognize my best self.
author: Franz Kafka

quote: You are my calm in a restless world.
author: Franz Kafka

quote: With you, I feel brave enough to dream.
author: Franz Kafka

quote: Your love is my daily miracle.
author: Franz Kafka

quote: I carry your warmth wherever I go.
author: Franz Kafka

quote: A book must be the axe for the frozen sea within us.
author: Franz Kafka

quote: I am free and that is why I am lost.
author: Franz Kafka

quote: You are free, and that is why you are lost.
author: Franz Kafka

quote: Paths are made by walking.
author: Franz Kafka

quote: I write differently from what I speak, I speak differently from what I think, I think differently from the way I ought to think.
author: Franz Kafka

quote: Anyone who keeps the ability to see beauty never grows old.
author: Franz Kafka

quote: In the struggle between yourself and the world, second the world.
author: Franz Kafka

quote: Start with what is right rather than what is acceptable.
author: Franz Kafka

quote: By believing passionately in something that still does not exist, we create it.
author: Franz Kafka

quote: All language is but a poor translation.
author: Franz Kafka

quote: Don't bend; don't water it down; don't try to make it logical.
author: Franz Kafka

quote: From a certain point onward there is no longer any turning back. That is the point that must be reached.
author: Franz Kafka

quote: Better to have, and not need, than to need, and not have.
author: Franz Kafka

quote: A cage went in search of a bird.
author: Franz Kafka

quote: Slept, woke up, slept, woke up, miserable life.
author: Franz Kafka

quote: Life shrinks or expands in proportion to one’s courage.
author: Anais Nin

quote: If you hear a voice within you say “you cannot paint,” then by all means paint and that voice will be silenced.
author: Vincent Van Gogh

quote: Believe you can and you’re halfway there.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: Everything you’ve ever wanted is on the other side of fear.
author: George Addair

quote: Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.
author: Arthur Ashe

quote: Fall seven times and stand up eight.
author: Japanese Proverb

quote: When one door of happiness closes, another opens...
author: Helen Keller

quote: Everything has beauty, but not everyone can see.
author: Confucius

quote: How wonderful it is that nobody need wait a single moment before starting to improve the world.
author: Anne Frank

quote: When I let go of what I am, I become what I might be.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: Happiness is not something readymade. It comes from your own actions.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: If you’re offered a seat on a rocket ship, don’t ask what seat! Just get on.
author: Sheryl Sandberg

quote: If you want to lift yourself up, lift up someone else.
author: Booker T. Washington

quote: I have been impressed with the urgency of doing. Knowing is not enough; we must apply.
author: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: Limitations live only in our minds. But if we use our imaginations, our possibilities become limitless.
author: Jamie Paolinetti

quote: What’s money? A man is a success if he gets up in the morning and goes to bed at night and in between does what he wants to do.
author: Bob Dylan

quote: A person who never made a mistake never tried anything new.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: It is never too late to be what you might have been.
author: George Eliot

quote: Build your own dreams, or someone else will hire you to build theirs.
author: Farrah Gray

quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
author: Confucius

quote: If you look at what you have in life, you’ll always have more.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: Our lives begin to end the day we become silent about things that matter.
author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quote: If you do what you’ve always done, you’ll get what you’ve always gotten.
author: Tony Robbins

quote: Dreaming, after all, is a form of planning.
author: Gloria Steinem

quote: Remember no one can make you feel inferior without your consent.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: When everything seems to be going against you, remember that the airplane takes off against the wind, not with it.
author: Henry Ford

quote: Change your thoughts and you change your world.
author: Norman Vincent Peale

quote: Nothing is impossible, the word itself says, “I’m possible!”
author: Audrey Hepburn

quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quote: In the middle of every difficulty lies opportunity.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: If you don’t take risks, you can’t create a future!
author: Monkey D Luffy

quote: If you don’t like your destiny, don’t accept it.
author: Naruto Uzumaki

quote: There’s no shame in falling down! True shame is to not stand up again!
author: Shintar Midorima

quote: Being weak is nothing to be ashamed of… Staying weak is !!
author: Fuegoleon Vermillion

quote: A dropout will beat a genius through hard work.
author: Rock Lee

quote: Reject common sense to make the impossible possible.
author: Simon

quote: A place where someone still thinks about you is a place you can call home.
author: Jiraiya

quote: The world isn’t perfect. But it’s there for us, doing the best it can….that’s what makes it so damn beautiful.
author: Roy Mustang

quote: Knowing you’re different is only the beginning. If you accept these differences you’ll be able to get past them and grow even closer.
author: Miss Kobayashi

quote: A person grows up when he’s able to overcome hardships.
author: Jiraiya

quote: Mistakes are not shackles that halt one from stepping forward. Rather, they are that which sustain and grow one’s heart.
author: Mavis Vermillion

quote: It’s more important to master the cards you’re holding than to complain about the ones your opponent was dealt.
author: Grimsley

quote: Moving on doesn’t mean you forget about things. It just means you have to accept what’s happened and continue living.
author: Erza Scarlet

quote: Everything has a beginning and an end. Life is just a cycle of starts and stops... it’s what being human is all about.
author: Jet Black

quote: A lesson without pain is meaningless. That’s because no one can gain without sacrificing something.
author: Edward Elric

quote: You need to accept the fact that you’re not the best and have all the will to strive to be better than anyone you face.
author: Roronoa Zoro

quote: Life s a bore if you don t challenge yourself
author: Yuu Nishinoya

quote: Being weak means that there is room to grow
author: Ittetsu Takeda

quote: With you, even silence feels like belonging.
author: Franz Kafka

quote: Your presence makes my fears grow quiet.
author: Franz Kafka

quote: Loving you feels like coming home.
author: Franz Kafka

quote: In your smile, I rediscover hope.
author: Franz Kafka

quote: You turn my doubts into courage.
author: Franz Kafka

quote: Loving you is learning how to endure absence.
author: Franz Kafka

quote: Your memory hurts more than your silence.
author: Franz Kafka

quote: I bleed quietly in your absence.
author: Franz Kafka

quote: You remain even after you have gone.
author: Franz Kafka

quote: My heart learned sorrow by loving you.
author: Franz Kafka

quote: Every letter from you is a piece of life.
author: Franz Kafka

quote: Distance teaches me patience in loving you.
author: Franz Kafka

quote: Between us lies space, not absence.
author: Franz Kafka

quote: I carry you across every mile.
author: Franz Kafka

quote: Time moves slowly when it carries your name.
author: Franz Kafka

quote: I love you in silence, where you cannot refuse me.
author: Franz Kafka

quote: My heart speaks to someone who never listens.
author: Franz Kafka

quote: I give you everything, you give me nothing.
author: Franz Kafka

quote: You are my dream that never wakes.
author: Franz Kafka

quote: I wait in a love that was never promised.
author: Franz Kafka

quote: Do not wait for strength; create it.
author: Franz Kafka

quote: Every struggle is proof that you are alive.
author: Franz Kafka

quote: Your fear is smaller than your potential.
author: Franz Kafka

quote: Begin, even if you are unsure.
author: Franz Kafka

quote: Growth starts where comfort ends.
author: Franz Kafka

quote: Life teaches slowly, but remembers everything.
author: Franz Kafka

quote: Understanding yourself is the longest journey.
author: Franz Kafka

quote: Truth often arrives quietly.
author: Franz Kafka

quote: Time reveals what words cannot.
author: Franz Kafka

quote: Every mistake carries a lesson.
author: Franz Kafka

quote: I am surrounded, yet alone.
author: Franz Kafka

quote: Silence is my longest companion.
author: Franz Kafka

quote: Some hearts speak only to themselves.
author: Franz Kafka

quote: Being unseen hurts more than being alone.
author: Franz Kafka

quote: I carry crowds inside my solitude.
author: Franz Kafka

quote: My dreams are louder than my doubts.
author: Franz Kafka

quote: Purpose is born from persistence.
author: Franz Kafka

quote: I live toward what I imagine.
author: Franz Kafka

quote: Every dream deserves effort.
author: Franz Kafka

quote: My future grows from today's courage.
author: Franz Kafka
